headerDisplay:
A `http` plugin with support of webhooks for homebridge.

The plugin gets its states from any system that is calling the url to trigger a state change.

Currently supports `contact`, `motion`, `occupancy`, `smoke`, `switches`, `push buttons`, `lights` (only on/off and brightness), `temperature`, `humidity`, `thermostats`, `co2sensors`, and `leak` sensors.
footerDisplay: Visit the Project [Readme](https://github.com/benzman81/homebridge-http-webhooks#readme) for more details.

sensors.title: Sensors
sensors.description: Create contact, motion, occupancy, smoke, temperature, humidity, airquality, light, or leak sensors.

switches.title: Switches
switches.description: Turn on and off switches by triggering a URL from any system.

on_url.title: On URL
on_url.placeholder: your url to switch the switch on

off_url.title: Off URL
off_url.placeholder: your url to switch the switch off

pushbuttons.title: Sensors
pushbuttons.description: Push Buttons by triggerring a URL from any system. The button will be released automatically.

push_url.title: Push URL
push_url.placeholder: your url to be called on push

lights.title: Lights
lights.description: Turn on and off Lights by triggering a URL from any system.

on_url.title: On URL
on_url.placeholder: your url to switch the light on

off_url.title: Off URL
off_url.placeholder: your url to switch the light off

brightness_url.title: Brightness URL
brightness_url.placeholder: your url to change the light brightness

co2sensors.title: CO2 Sensor
co2sensors.description: Control a CO2 sensor by updating the PPM value.

thermostats.title: Thermostats
thermostats.description: Control a thermostat by updating four different values.

minTemp.title: Lower bound for the temperature selector in the Home app

maxTemp.title: Upper bound for the temperature selector in the Home app

minStep.title: Minimum increment value for the temperature selector in the Home app

outlets.title: Outlets
outlets.description: Turn on and off Outlets by triggering a URL from any system.

on_url.placeholder: your url to switch the outlet on

off_url.title: Off URL
off_url.placeholder: your url to switch the outlet off

security.title: Security
security.description: Control a security system by updating two different values.

garagedooropeners.title: Garage Door Openers
garagedooropeners.description: Control a garage door opener by updating three different values.

open_url.title: Open URL
open_url.placeholder: your url to open the garage door

close_url.title: Close URL
close_url.placeholder: your url to close the garage door

statelessswitches.title: Stateless Switches
statelessswitches.description: Stateless switches requires 3 parameters accessoryId, buttonName and the event to trigger: Single press = 0, Double press = 1, Long press = 2.

windowcoverings.title: Window Coverings
windowcoverings.description: Control a window coverings by updating three different values.

open_url.title: Open URL

close_url.title: Close URL

off_url.placeholder: your url to switch the fanv2 off

speed_url.title: Speed URL

lock_url.placeholder: your url to lock the fanv2s physical controls

unlock_url.title: Unlock URL
unlock_url.placeholder: your url to unlock the fanv2s physical controls

target_state_url.title: Target State URL
target_state_url.placeholder: your url to change the fanv2s target state

swing_mode_url.title: Swing Mode URL
swing_mode_url.placeholder: your url to change the fanv2s swing mode

rotation_direction_url.title: Rotation Direction URL
rotation_direction_url.placeholder: your url to change the fanv2s rotation direction
